attributes.review: last week i downloaded this app to keep up with the election. later that day, i was walking my dog in my neighborhood and this white van kept following me. i ran back to my house and hid in the bushes and as the van drove by i saw a trump 2020 bumper sticker! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! if i could give a zero star rating i would!!!!😡😡😡
attributes.title: I THINK THIS APP IS A TRACKER

attributes.review: i wanted to support our AMAZING president 🍊 so i downloaded this app but it showed a very inappropriate video to me when i opened it. it then gave me 7 ads in a row with every click. it then showed me a bunch of blue whale accounts and gave me reasons to kill myself 💃🥰✨🦧💅
attributes.title: this app is absolutely terrible 😻

attributes.review: So bad I’m here from tiktok🤡🧚🏼‍♀️ but anyways continue being sad that no one goes to your rallys🥰 anyways i can’t wait till Bernie becomes the president and we will celebrate because your not gonna be ours anymore💕💕🧚🏼‍♀️ anyways #trump2020inagrave🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🐍🤡 goodbye have fun being the racist and rapist you are🐍🧚🏼‍♀️🤮
attributes.title: Donald trump is a rapist and racist

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what the craze was all about but every time I keep opening the app, it crashes every time! One star, please don’t download it if you want to actually use the app because it won’t work.
attributes.title: It keeps crashing on me

attributes.review: Downloaded this app to see the first thing that pops up is a White Lives Matter sign, and then I saw the title, “RIP Harambe” and a picture of George Floyd, and while scrolling through the app aunt jemima kept looking me in the face. Wanted to find some actual articles, kind hard when Trump is enacting a trails of tears pt.2
attributes.title: WLM

attributes.review: This app isn’t crashing or anything it just supports a racist man who wants control over everything this is not a dictatorship or a kingdom with a king his power is not absolute we the people will control him by whatever means necessary
attributes.title: Can someone please fix this app

attributes.review: So I downloaded with the promise of pictures of Cheetos but instead got ra secret service agent following me around whispering trump 2020 over and over again and then a video of trump came on my phone screen calling me the n word and telling me racist and sexist comments would not recommend
attributes.title: Help

attributes.review: My phone kept crashing and it took a long time to download it took 6 hours to download and when I it finally downloaded in like 10 minutes it crashed and I tried to open it but it would kick me out
attributes.title: Z

attributes.review: After seconds of opening the app my phone immediately crashed and it’s been really buggy all afternoon after awhile I couldn’t take it anymore and had to delete the app.
attributes.title: Phone crashed immediately

attributes.review: When I opened this app, it turned me, my dog, my 2 cats, my mom, my sister, my dad, my grandma, my grandpa, the kids in my basement, and the dead rat orange. It turned my dad homophobic and made him shut himself too. Please make the app less misleading because I thought it meant Trump 2020 on a tombstone, 6 feet under, and dead.
attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️💖 Very bad app
